SO101 ROS2 Documentation

Welcome to the documentation for the SO101 ROS2 workspace. This project provides an open-source ROS 2 driver for the Lerobot SO101 manipulator.

Acknowledgments

The SO101 ROS 2 bridge builds on the Lerobot project from Hugging Face for the leader and follower device APIs used throughout the bridge implementation.
